PerfectNetExp.abs: velvetgrass 绒毛草属, velvetleaf 绒毛叶, velveting 起绒
velveting 起绒, velvetleaf 青麻, velvetleaf 绒毛叶
...内盆栽的A. pictum等是观赏植物。其中悬风铃花另有斑叶变种。而在中国为重要纤维植物之苘麻(A. theophrastii)，于美国称作绒叶(velvetleaf)或印度葵，常成为田间杂草。Category:锦葵科Category:风铃花属|*.

means.word_mean: 1. arborescent perennial shrub having palmately lobed furry leaves and showy red-purple flowers; southwestern United States
2. tall annual herb or subshrub of tropical Asia having velvety leaves and yellow flowers and yielding a strong fiber; naturalized in southeastern Europe and United States
